To start the Python Lumerical Constructor Library you need first to:

from Constructor import Constructor
from Constructor import loadingBar

# Call the Constructor Object
obj = Constructor(file, Lumerical Solver Type)

# OR
obj = Constructor(file, Lumerical Solver Type, MaterialPath)

file = Path to lumapi.py
Example: "lumerical/2022-r2.4/api/python/lumapi.py"

MaterialPath = Path to Material Library (OPTIONAL)
Example: "/Desktop/LNOI_Env/LiNbO3.mdf"

Lumerical Solver Type = Solver Type like "EME" or "FDTD"

# To close Lumerical
obj.Close()

# For further help after creating the object
obj.Help()
